summary: The exploits of four boys who leave Sydney and head out for a weekend of surfing and adventure. Unfortunately the fun takes a serious turn when they find themselves involved in a murder.
cast: John Jarratt|Phillip Avalon|Steve Bisley|Mel Gibson|James Elliott|Deborah Forman|Abigail|Ward 'Pally' Austin|Judith Woodroffe|Carl Rorke|Ross Bailey|Hank Tick|Bruce Cole|Vicki Hekimian|Karen Williams|Peter McGovern|John Flahety|The Marshall Brothers Band
title: Summer City
